title: Understanding the Quotient Rule
text: When dividing powers with the same base, you subtract the exponents. This is known as the Quotient Rule of Exponents.

title: Identify the Base
text: In the expression $$\frac{t^{23}}{t^{15}}$$, it is important to recognize the common base. Both terms have a base of 't'.

title: Apply the Quotient Rule
text: Subtract the exponents of the common base t: $$23$$ - $$15$$.
